topic.title: How to Simplify the Header (keeping only the chapter title)

body.p: The headers display information comprising of: map title, part title, chapter title, and section title, ending in the page number.
body.codeblock: content: string(maptitle) string(parttitle) string(chaptertitle) string(sectiontitle) " | " counter(page);
